title: BitSwapNow
author: BitSwapNow
content: Exchange bitcoin and over 350+ digital currencies instantly. Custodian free swap service that is safe, quick and easy. You can cross chain swap say like eth for bnb. All rates are transparent and we offer some of the lowest crypto swap rates in the industry. Purchase and or sell crypto with credit or debit cards as well. No sign up and all funds are safe as it is a wallet-less exchange.Powered by some of the largest crypto exchanges and defi platforms, BitSwapNow has over 350+ supported coins. With huge ties to this liquidity we offer the options to swap cross chain assets like BTC to BNB or ETH to XMR. You can also buy and sell crypto with supported banks and debit/credit cards as well.We also syndicate crypto related, blockchain and NFT news from the industry. Please use our service and let your friends know too! If anyone has any questions or comments please feel free to drop a comment below.https://bitswapnow.com

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Almost all instant exchanges offer the same things, so what is an additional offer from you? And what is your marketing plan to introduce your platform to the crypto community? Is that complete and running right now? There are a lot of marketing opportunities on the forum as well. Feel free to ping me if you need marketing support.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: 1. A trusted service can not operate without any terms of service. Where are your terms of services?2. I see an option for one to sign in/sign up. If the service is custodian free, then why is it necessary to create an account?

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: BitSwapNow on May 11, 2022, 10:02:56 PMIf anyone has any questions or comments please feel free to drop a comment below.New instant exchange is not something I would use expecting it to be ''safe'' for avoiding identification...I was reading in your FAQ page that you are checking each transactions with automated risk management system and that you can ask for kyc documents at any time.Is this only for fiat to crypto transactions, or it can be applied for any transactions using your website?

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: BitSwapNow on May 11, 2022, 10:02:56 PMIf anyone has any questions or comments please feel free to drop a comment below.You might want to consider moving out the refund wallet option from advanced settings [such a thing should be mandatory]!Quote from: https://bitswapnow.com/faq/BitSwapNow performs certain cryptocurrency exchanges through third-party partner services.~Snipped~exchanges of certain trading pairs are carried through our partners.In the latter part of the "About Us" page, it says "you never hold our funds", but the above quote implies that you might be handling some of the exchanges directly on your platform. Am I missing something?

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: Hey all thanks for the responses and questions.As far as offering additional services we do offer the option to buy and sell crypto with a bank card. Cross chain swaps ect. We are aware there are other services that are similar. I think its also cool how we syndicate news around the crypto sphere. Additionally we would like to offer other services and maybe our own personal open source wallet eventually. As far as marketing I have a company in the final stages of a press release that will be syndicated across a huge variety of major outlets. The site and business are still in its infancy stages. Also open to marketing and other collaborations within the community here.In response to the other question about safety and KYC. The KYC is more so for fraud and buying with a credit or debit card. Obviously this could be considered a high risk transaction for obvious reasons. Crypto to crypto swaps rarely get triggered and is more so looking to check if funds are stolen or tied to cyber-crime such as ransomware.The Terms of Service still needs to be added. I probably should have waited before posting the site. Was just curious to get some feedback from the forum here. Also the Login/Sign Up button on the header has been removed. That was part of the wordpress template we used and forgot to disable. Thank you for bringing that to my attention."You might want to consider moving out the refund wallet option from advanced settings " This is for certain circumstances where a transaction fails and can be returned to sender. We are not handling any transactions manually or on our own. They are all routed to 3rd party providers through APIs. This is for liquidity and so cross chain swaps can occur. Working with exchanges like binance, kucoin, pancakeswap and Uniswap.I think I touched on everyones comments and concerns. Again thanks for the feedback and constructive criticism.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: Updated site with Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Risk Disclosure and also a Hard Fork Disclosure. As well as added a contact us page and will be fixing and adding a few more minor details of the next few days.
